trans-unit.source: Represents an attribute indicating that a service operation is logically an invoke operation and that it can be called by the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] REST programming model.
trans-unit.target: 代表屬性，指出服務作業，以邏輯方式叫用作業，而且它可以呼叫[!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]REST 程式設計模型。

trans-unit.source: The WebInvokeAttribute attribute is applied to a service operation in addition to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute> and associates the operation with a `UriTemplate` as well as an underlying transport verb that represents an invocation (for example, HTTP POST, PUT, or DELETE).
trans-unit.target: WebInvokeAttribute 屬性會套用至服務作業除了<xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute>並將與作業相關聯`UriTemplate`以及表示叫用 （例如，HTTP POST、 PUT 或 DELETE） 的基礎傳輸動詞。</xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The WebInvokeAttribute attribute is a *passive* operation behavior (the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationBehavior> methods do nothing) that adds metadata to the operation description.
trans-unit.target: WebInvokeAttribute 屬性是*被動*作業行為 (<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationBehavior>方法不會執行任何動作)，將中繼資料加入至作業描述。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationBehavior>

trans-unit.source: Applying the WebInvokeAttribute attribute to a service operation has no effect unless a behavior that looks for this metadata in the operation description (such as <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebHttpBehavior>) is added to the service's behavior collection.
trans-unit.target: 將 WebInvokeAttribute 屬性套用至服務作業沒有任何作用，除非，尋找此中繼資料，在作業說明中的行為 (例如<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebHttpBehavior>) 新增至服務的行為集合。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebHttpBehavior>

trans-unit.source: The WebInvokeAttribute determines what HTTP method that a service operation responds to.
trans-unit.target: WebInvokeAttribute 判斷哪些服務作業回應的 HTTP 方法。

trans-unit.source: By default, all methods that have the WebInvokeAttribute applied respond to POST requests.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，已套用 WebInvokeAttribute 的所有方法都回應 POST 要求。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebInvokeAttribute.Method%2A> property allows you to specify a different HTTP method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebInvokeAttribute.Method%2A>屬性可讓您指定不同的 HTTP 方法。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebInvokeAttribute.Method%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you want a service operation to respond to GET, use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebGetAttribute> instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果您要服務作業回應 GET，使用<xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebGetAttribute>改用。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebGetAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Web.WebGetAttribute"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Web.WebGetAttribute"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets the body style of the messages that are sent to and from the service operation.
trans-unit.target: 取得並設定服務作業來回傳送的訊息本文樣式。

trans-unit.source: When set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageBodyStyle>, the result of the service operation is written directly to the body of the response message.
trans-unit.target: 當設定為<xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageBodyStyle>，服務作業的結果直接寫到回應訊息的本文。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageBodyStyle>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Operations that take a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message> and return void are handled specially by the formatters.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 之作業<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message>並傳回 void 處理特殊的格式器。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message>

trans-unit.source: The formatters do not emit the wrapper name in the response even if BodyStyle is set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageBodyStyle>.
trans-unit.target: 格式器不會發出回應中的包裝函式名稱即使 BodyStyle 設<xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageBodyStyle>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageBodyStyle>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageBodyStyle"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageBodyStyle"></xref>列舉值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the IsBodyStyleSetExplicitly property.
trans-unit.target: 取得 IsBodyStyleSetExplicitly 屬性。

trans-unit.source: This property is designed to be used by the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure and should never be set from user code.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性設計供[!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]基礎結構並不能從使用者程式碼來設定。

trans-unit.source: A value that specifies whether the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebGetAttribute.BodyStyle*> property was set explicitly.
trans-unit.target: 值，指定是否<xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebGetAttribute.BodyStyle*>屬性已明確設定。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebGetAttribute.BodyStyle*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the IsRequestFormatSetExplicitly property.
trans-unit.target: 取得 IsRequestFormatSetExplicitly 屬性。

trans-unit.source: This property is designed to be used by the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure and should never be set from user code.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性設計供[!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]基礎結構並不能從使用者程式碼來設定。

trans-unit.source: A value that specifies whether the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebGetAttribute.RequestFormat*> property was set.
trans-unit.target: 值，指定是否<xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebGetAttribute.RequestFormat*>屬性已設定。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebGetAttribute.RequestFormat*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the IsResponseFormatSetExplicitly property.
trans-unit.target: 取得 IsResponseFormatSetExplicitly 屬性。

trans-unit.source: This property is designed to be used by the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure and should never be set from user code.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性設計供[!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]基礎結構並不能從使用者程式碼來設定。

trans-unit.source: A value that specifies whether the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebGetAttribute.ResponseFormat*> property was set.
trans-unit.target: 值，指定是否<xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebGetAttribute.ResponseFormat*>屬性已設定。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebGetAttribute.ResponseFormat*>

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets the protocol (for example HTTP) method the service operation responds to.
trans-unit.target: 取得與設定服務作業回應的通訊協定 (例如 HTTP) 方法。

trans-unit.source: Method defaults to POST.
trans-unit.target: 方法預設為 POST。

trans-unit.source: The protocol method associated with the operation.
trans-unit.target: 與作業相關聯的通訊協定方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets the RequestFormat property.
trans-unit.target: 取得與設定 RequestFormat 屬性。

trans-unit.source: This property determines the format of requests made to a service operation.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性決定對服務作業之要求的格式。

trans-unit.source: The possible values are `Xml` and `Json`.
trans-unit.target: 可能的值為`Xml`和`Json`。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageFormat"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageFormat"></xref>列舉值。

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets the ResponseFormat property.
trans-unit.target: 取得與設定 ResponseFormat 屬性。

trans-unit.source: This property determines the format of responses sent from a service operation.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性決定服務作業發出的回應格式。

trans-unit.source: The possible values are `Xml` and `Json`.
trans-unit.target: 可能的值為`Xml`和`Json`。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageFormat"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageFormat"></xref>列舉值。

trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationBehavior.AddBindingParameters%28System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription%2CSystem.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingParameterCollection%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 實作<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationBehavior.AddBindingParameters%28System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription%2CSystem.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingParameterCollection%29>方法。

trans-unit.source: This method does nothing because the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebInvokeAttribute> attribute is a passive operation behavior.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不會執行任何動作因為<xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebInvokeAttribute>屬性是被動作業行為。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebInvokeAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The operation description.
trans-unit.target: 作業描述。

trans-unit.source: A collection of binding parameters.
trans-unit.target: 繫結參數集合。

trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationBehavior.ApplyClientBehavior%28System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription%2CSystem.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ClientOperation%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 實作<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationBehavior.ApplyClientBehavior%28System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription%2CSystem.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ClientOperation%29>方法。

trans-unit.source: This method does nothing because the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebInvokeAttribute> attribute is a passive operation behavior.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不會執行任何動作因為<xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebInvokeAttribute>屬性是被動作業行為。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebInvokeAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The operation description.
trans-unit.target: 作業描述。

trans-unit.source: The client operation.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端作業。

trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationBehavior.ApplyDispatchBehavior%28System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription%2CSystem.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.DispatchOperation%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 實作<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationBehavior.ApplyDispatchBehavior%28System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription%2CSystem.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.DispatchOperation%29>方法。

trans-unit.source: This method does nothing because the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebInvokeAttribute> attribute is a passive operation behavior.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不會執行任何動作因為<xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebInvokeAttribute>屬性是被動作業行為。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebInvokeAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The operation description.
trans-unit.target: 作業描述。

trans-unit.source: The operation to dispatch to.
trans-unit.target: 要發送至作業。

trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationBehavior.Validate%28System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 實作<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationBehavior.Validate%28System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription%29>方法。

trans-unit.source: This method does nothing because the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebInvokeAttribute> attribute is a passive operation behavior.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不會執行任何動作因為<xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebInvokeAttribute>屬性是被動作業行為。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebInvokeAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The operation description.
trans-unit.target: 作業描述。

trans-unit.source: The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) template for the service operation.
trans-unit.target: 服務作業的統一資源識別元 (URI) 範本。

trans-unit.source: URI templates are used to determine which requests get dispatched to which service operations.
trans-unit.target: URI 範本用來決定哪些要求分派給哪些服務作業。

trans-unit.source: URI templates allow you to map a URI or a set of URIs to a service operation.
trans-unit.target: URI 範本允許您將 URI 或 Uri 集合對應至服務作業。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] URI templates, see [UriTemplate and UriTemplateTable](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]URI 範本，請參閱[UriTemplate 與 UriTemplateTable](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)

trans-unit.source: The URI template for the service operation.
trans-unit.target: 服務作業的 URI 範本。
